item.title: DaVinci Resolve - Fusion
item.description: Quick tips Auto Save Auto save (live save) is on by default and you might want to turn it off. DaVinci Resolve > Preferences > Project Save and Load > Save Settings > Live save Bookmarks You can add bookmarks with Ctrl + D Underlays can also function as bookmarks Also in 3 dot menu Page Edit Shift + 4 Fusion Shift + 5 Color Shift + 6 Viewers There are two viewers.
